item.title: Wells Fargo CFO Says Consumers, Businesses in Good Shape
item.description: Wells Fargo CFO Mike Santomassimo discusses the bank’s second-quarter earnings report and lowered full-year forecast for net interest income on “Bloomberg The Close.”

item.title: Wells Fargo 2Q Net Interest Income Misses Estimates
item.description: Wells Fargo & Co. posted $11.7 billion in net interest income in the second quarter, falling just short of analysts’ estimates of $11.8 billion. That prompted Wells Fargo to lower its full-year NI

item.title: Wells Fargo Misses Net Interest Income Estimates, Cuts Guidance
item.description: Wells Fargo & Co. lowered its full-year guidance for net interest income, after another quarter of tepid growth amid the ongoing trade war.
